programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E13 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 13, Ukraine
programme.desc: Welcome to Ukraine and the wonderful capital city of Kyiv. Were here for the second time for the iconic truck pull World Championships! The reigning World champion Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland will defend his title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E14 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 14, Romania
programme.desc: In this episode, a final chance for our athletes to get vital world series ranking points on board to give them the best possible chance of success and an initial advantage at the finals. It's the last show before the world finals and the top 10 places are up for grabs, but who will they be?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The event featured the long-awaited rematch between former champion Badr Hari and Hesdy Gerges as Glory 51 headliner. This event also featured a 4-Man Welterweight Contender Tournament to earn a shot at the Glory Welterweight Championship.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY Kickboxing’s Summer of GLORY concluded with a massive event from the Johan Cruijff Arena in Amsterdam. In the night’s headliner, heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven took on Brazilian challenger Guto Inocente. Verhoeven had defended his belt seven straight times since capturing the title in 2014. His winning streak inside the GLORY ring stood at 16. Inocente looked to dethrone the world’s top-ranked heavyweight riding the momentum of wins over Benjamin Adegbuyi, D’Angelo Marshall and Hesdy Gerges. Gold was also on the line in the co-main event, as longtime featherweight titleholder Robin van Roosmalen rematched interim champion Petchpanomrung Kiatmookao. The pair met previously at...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY is bringing out the heavy hitters for their final show of 2018, as an eight-man heavyweight tournament has been set for Rotterdam. Headlined by former heavyweight contender tournament winner Benjamin Adegbuyi and Jamal Ben Saddik as the top two seed, the winner will go on to win $100,000 for making it through the eight-man, three-round affair.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A stacked SUPERFIGHT SERIES card is headlined by former welterweight champion Murthel ‘The Predator’ Groenhart (68-23-3, 39 KO’s) and rising threat Alim Nabiyev (50-7, 21 KO’s). The winner will forcefully insert his name into the title shot conversation.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Mike Short comes from a history of street fighting and recognizes the importance of training and discipline. He has been coaching Boxing for many years and relishes the fact that his entire family comes together at his events, run out of Dekada Gym.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Craig Wilson as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesn't let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E229 Undercover Love S1 E229
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E229 Dholi Beats S1 E229
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E229 King of Hearts S1 E229
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E229 Second Chances S1 E229
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 Jodha Akbar S3 E23
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E229 This is Fate S1 E229
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E24 Jodha Akbar S3 E24
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Nagroda Jest Twoja... Człowiek Mój
programme.desc: Grupa zabójców poszukuje rewolwerowca El Puro, by zdobyć 10 000 dolarów nagrody.

programme.title: Zasadzka
programme.desc: W 1866 roku agent James Barlow przenika do gangu braci Reno, terroryzującego Seymour w Indianie. Udając przestępcę, zdobywa ich zaufanie, lecz zakochuje się w Laurze Reno, siostrze bandytów. Konflikt lojalności i przygotowywany napad na pociąg prowadzą do dramatycznego finału.

programme.title: Szlak Cariboo
programme.desc: Jim Redfern marzy o ranczu i stadzie bydła. Wyrusza w drogę z przyjaciółmi, ale spotykają Franka Walsha, który ich prześladuje. Po ciężkiej ranie Mike’a Evansa i konflikcie, Redfern musi walczyć o marzenia, gdy odkrywa złoto.

programme.title: Towarzysze Chwały
programme.desc: Czy dla dwóch oficerów kawalerii może być coś gorszego niż walka z Indianami? Tak. To walczyć o tę samą kobietę.

programme.title: Pojedynek Kogutów
programme.desc: Dwóch oszustów niszczy lokalną gospodarkę małego miasteczka, które odwiedzają... ale potem zakochują się w dwóch młodych kobietach spokrewnionych z bogatymi właścicielami ziemskimi, którzy są celem ich głównego oszustwa.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 48, 49
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Niesłusznie oskarżeni
programme.desc: Trzej kowboje, Wes, Vern i Otis, przypadkowo trafiają do kryjówki bandytów. Gdy grupa mścicieli atakuje chatę, Wes i Vern uciekają, lecz zostają omyłkowo uznani za członków gangu. Ścigani przez prawo, muszą udowodnić swoją niewinność, zanim dopadnie ich niesprawiedliwa kara.

programme.title: Doktor Złote Ręce
programme.desc: Były chirurg Doc McGregor jest teraz karciarzem. Zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i ścigany przez Slade'a, łowcę nagród.

programme.title: Ogród zła
programme.desc: Trzech Amerykanów otrzymuje propozycję: za 2000 dolarów mają uratować męża kobiety uwięzionego w kopalni złota w górach Meksyku. W trakcie podróży każdy z nich kalkuluje szanse na zdobycie kobiety lub kopalni, o ile przeżyją tę niebezpieczną misję.

programme.title: Cjamango
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango wygrywa w pokera worek złota, gangi El Tigre i Don Pablo atakują go. Podczas leczenia ran, Cjamango zaprzyjaźnia się z meksykańskim chłopcem Manuelem i piękną dziewczyną, Perlą.

programme.title: Może Bóg ci wybaczy... lecz nie ja
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango jest z dala od swojego rancza, sześciu bandytów atakuje i zabija wszystkich członków jego rodziny.

programme.title: Trumna Dla Szeryfa
programme.desc: Anthony Steffen wciela się w rolę Shenandoah, człowieka zagadki, który dołącza do złowrogiej bandy rozbójników po przejściu niemal niemożliwej do wykonania i wymagającej śmierci inicjacji.

programme.title: A Niebo Będzie Nam Dachem
programme.desc: Dwoje włóczęgów spotyka się i wkrótce stają się towarzyszami podróży. Ale jeden z nich, Tim (Gemma), jest ścigany przez szalonego mordercę i jego bandę rewolwerowców, którzy chcą wyrównać stare porachunki.

programme.title: Ostatnia Misja
programme.desc: Sławny rewolwerowiec powraca do swojej byłej żony, która chce tylko, aby uratował jej męża szeryfa przed zabiciem przez rewolwerowców chcących uwolnić skazanego więźnia.

programme.title: Lola Colt - Twarzą w Twarz z El Diablo
programme.desc: Tancerka z saloonu Lola wraz z innymi tancerkami przybywa do miasteczka Sant'Anna. Miasteczko jest terroryzowane przez El Diablo, banitę, który chce sprzedać okoliczne ziemie przedsiębiorstwu kolejowemu. Wraz z Rodem, młodzieńcem, który się w niej zakochał, Lola pomaga kolonistom w buncie.

programme.title: Zwierzęta
programme.desc: Alice McAndrew zostaje zgwałcona i porzucona na śmierć przez bandytów. Ratuje ją wódz Apaczów, Chatto. Gdy wraca do sił, wyrusza z nim na krwawą zemstę. Choć ciało zdrowieje, trauma pozostaje. Czy odnajdzie siłę, by dokończyć to, co zaczęła?

programme.title: Śmierć Nie Dba o Czas
programme.desc: Meksykański chłop eksmitowany ze swojej ziemi staje się rozwścieczonym banitą. W końcu zostaje aresztowany i trafia do więzienia.

programme.title: Więzienie Hellgate
programme.desc: Żołnierz Unii oskarżony o szpiegostwo trafia do odosobnionego więzienia na pustyni. Po nieudanej próbie ucieczki trafia do izolatki. Gdy wybucha epidemia, pojawia się szansa na odkupienie – czy z niej skorzysta? Przejmujący dramat o winie, nadziei i drugiej szansie.

programme.title: Ben i Charlie Na Dzikim Zachodzie
programme.desc: Dwóch wspólników przy użyciu forteli i oszustw, próbuje napełnić swoje puste kieszenie. Dwójka okrada bank, a następnie zmaga się z podłym i chciwym szeryfem.

programme.title: Buddy jedzie na zachód
programme.desc: „Doktor” i Indianin Girolamo trafiają do wioski na Dzikim Zachodzie, gdzie są świadkami terroru ze strony gangu i skorumpowanego szeryfa, który odkrył złoto pod ziemią. Bohaterowie decydują się pomóc mieszkańcom w walce o sprawiedliwość i pozbycie się przestępców.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec z Jalisco
programme.desc: Salvador kocha się w pięknej Marii, niestety jej ojciec nie akceptuje ich związku.

programme.title: Pawnee
programme.desc: Blada Strzała, biały mężczyzna wychowany przez wodza Pawnee, zostaje wysłany do białych osadników, gdy ci wkraczają na ziemie plemienia. Przyjmuje imię Paul Fletcher i zostaje zwiadowcą taborów. Po śmierci wodza, Szalony Lis przejmuje władzę i prowadzi Pawnee do ataku na osadników, mimo dążenia do pokoju.

programme.title: Utah Blaine
programme.desc: Utah Blaine ratuje od śmierci Joe'go Neal'a. By się odwdzięczyć Joe zatrudnia Utah jako zarządcę swojego rancza. Na początku Utah pomaga tylko jego kolega rewolwerowiec, ale stopniowo zjednuje sobie mieszkańców miasteczka. Kulminacją wydarzeń będzie starcie z Russ'em Nevers'em i jego poplecznikiem Rink'em Witter'em oraz ich bandą złoczyńców.

programme.title: Niebezpieczni kompani
programme.desc: Były sierżant Yellowleg ratuje oszusta i planuje napad na bank. Przez przypadek zabija syna tancerki Kit. Postanawia pomóc jej przewieźć ciało przez terytorium Apaczów. W trakcie niebezpiecznej podróży wychodzą na jaw ich prawdziwe intencje i uczucia.

programme.title: Panhandle
programme.desc: John Sands, były szeryf z Teksasu, uciekinier w Meksyku, dowiaduje się o tajemniczym morderstwie brata Billy'ego. Pomimo nagrody za jego głowę, wraca do Panhandle, by odkryć prawdę i znaleźć zabójcę.

programme.title: Szybkoręki
programme.desc: Gang byłych konfederatów oblega fort kawalerii.

programme.title: Siedzący Byk
programme.desc: Siedzący Byk, wódz plemienia Siuksów, zostaje sprowokowany przez generała Custera do walki, co prowadzi do słynnej bitwy pod Little Bighorn. Oficer Parrish, przyjaciel Indian, stara się zapobiec wojnie, lecz zostaje oskarżony o zdradę. Siedzący Byk staje w jego obronie, zwracając się do prezydenta Granta.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Siedem Rewolwerów, Jedna Masakra
programme.desc: Mężczyzna zostaje aresztowany, osądzony i skazany za napad, który w rzeczywistości popełnił ktoś inny.

programme.title: Ponad Nienawiścią
programme.desc: Rodzina pionierów zostaje niemal doszczętnie zniszczona przez żądnych zemsty Indian: Mały George został pozostawiony zemdlony na ziemi, a jego mała siostra adoptowana przez indiańskiego wodza. Los sprawi, że znów się połączą.

programme.title: Bohaterowie Fortu Worth
programme.desc: Podczas wojny secesyjnej, grupa konfederatów z pomocą Apaczy, próbuje zdobyć fort Unionistów, jednocześnie starając się uzyskać poparcie cesarza Meksyku Maksymiliana.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: Rodzina Sorensonów zostaje zamordowana. Wygląda na to, że przez Indian. Obok miejsca zbrodni wyrasta miasteczko Gold Hill, którym rządzi grupę biznesmenów.

programme.title: Czas Masakry
programme.desc: Poszukiwacz złota i jego wiecznie pijany przyrodni brat muszą walczyć z ranczerem i jego sadystycznym synem po tym, jak ci przejmują kontrolę nad ich farmą.

programme.title: Samotna Siódemka
programme.desc: Rodzina z pogranicza przemierza Stany Zjednoczone pociągiem z wagonami, w nadziei na lepsze życie na Terytorium Oregonu.

programme.title: Przeklęte Rewolwery z Dallas
programme.desc: Wyjęty spod prawa Szybkoręki (Álvarez) napada na dyliżans, którym podróżuje Clay Stone (Beir), piosenkarka Katy Dior (Marandi) i hazardzista Fred Foster (Mathot). Stone będzie szukał zemsty.

programme.title: Podwójny Judasz
programme.desc: Luke Barret traci pamięć w wyniku urazu głowy, którego doznał podczas strzelaniny. Próbując odnaleźć człowieka, który chciał go zabić, Luk odkryje straszną prawdę o swojej rodzinie, a także, że sam był płatnym rewolwerowcem.

programme.title: Ramon - Meksykanin
programme.desc: Esmerelda zostaje zaatakowana, a jej brat Juan Morales ginie, co wywołuje konflikt rodzinny. Bandziory pod wodzą Ramona Morales napadają na ranczo, zabijając ojca i porywając Esmereldę. Slim Baxter mimo próśb matki podejmuje walkę o zemstę i sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Santee
programme.desc: Jody dołącza do ojca, nie wiedząc, że to przestępca. Po osieroceniu przez łowcę nagród Santee, z którym zawiązuje ojcowską więź, przeszłość powraca – gang odpowiedzialny za śmierć Santee próbuje zniszczyć ich nową rodzinę.

programme.title: Spóźniona zemsta
programme.desc: Chłopiec z Dzikiego Zachodu, nawiedzany wspomnieniami masakry rodziny, dorasta z pragnieniem zemsty. Zakochuje się w przybranej siostrze, walczy z zakazanym uczuciem, wrogością brata i groźbą śmierci ze strony członka rodziny.

programme.title: Pojedynek w Durango
programme.desc: Dan Tomlinson, znany kiedyś jako Will Sabre, próbuje zerwać z przeszłością, ale jego były gang chce go zmusić do powrotu. Po drodze spotyka osieroconego chłopca i zaczyna pracę w banku. Gdy dochodzi do napadu, Dan zostaje oskarżony o współpracę z przestępcami i musi oczyścić swoje imię.

programme.title: Trzy Dolary Ołowiu
programme.desc: Rudy wraca do domu, by zemścić się za śmierć ojca, którego zabili miejscowi bandyci.

programme.title: Żyjąc ze Zmarłym
programme.desc: Max McLean przeżywa przygody w lesie z młodym mężczyzną o imieniu Ish, który pomaga jej odnaleźć sens w samobójstwie jej chłopaka.

programme.title: Masz rakietę, to do gwiazd!
programme.desc: The Three Stooges przypadkowo startują rakietą i lądują na Wenus. Tam czekają na nich gadający jednorożec, ziejąca ogniem tarantula i komputer, który tworzy ich złe klony. Szalona komedia sci-fi pełna gagów i absurdalnych przygód!

programme.title: Milenialsi
programme.desc: Rozdzierająca serce historia dwóch młodych par, które przechodzą z okresu dojrzewania do dorosłości i stają w obliczu związanych z nią wyzwań i problemów.

programme.title: Nieubłagana Sprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Była agentka australijskiego wywiadu Victoria De Vries, wiedzie spokojne życie na przedmieściach Ameryki, gdzie jako samotna matka wychowuje jedyną córkę i prowadzi zajęcia we własnej szkole M.M.A. Kiedy jej córka wyjeżdża na kemping i nie wraca, Victoria jest zmuszona wrócić do akcji.

programme.title: Dzień Prania
programme.desc: W nowoorleańskim całodobowym barze-pralni wybucha dziwaczna bójka pomiędzy bezdomną uliczną artystką, najgorszym w mieście dilerem narkotyków, zdesperowaną piosenkarką i skorumpowanym barmanem.

programme.title: Poza prawem
programme.desc: Komandos Royal Marines Jake O'Neil zmaga się z życiem cywilnym. Gdy jego była dziewczyna Jade prosi o pomoc w sprawie śmierci ojca, zgadza się. Szybko wpada w sieć intryg i morderstw.

programme.title: Pieśni chwały
programme.desc: Major Jock Sinclair służy w szkockim pułku górskim od czasów młodości, gdy zaczynał jako dudziarz. W czasie II wojny światowej został tymczasowym dowódcą pułku. Teraz jednostka powraca do Szkocji, a stanowisko dowódcy przejmuje nowy oficer – podpułkownik Basil Barrow. Jock nie potrafi pogodzić się ze zmianą i zaczyna otwarcie rywalizować z nowym dowódcą, wciągając w konflikt córkę, partnerkę oraz pozostałych oficerów.

programme.title: Drugi Raz
programme.desc: Do małego miasteczka Brattleboro w stanie Vermont przybywa tajemnicza dziewczyna, by stworzyć dla siebie nowe życie. Jej przeszłość pozostaje nieznana.

programme.title: Hibiskus
programme.desc: Młody pracownik cmentarza musi w tajemnicy przez 3 dni opiekować się dziewczyną.

programme.title: Miłość Jest Ślepa
programme.desc: Pewna dziewczyna próbuje odzyskać swojego byłego niewidomego chłopaka, udając inne dziewczyny.

programme.title: Szybcy i Szaleni
programme.desc: Jako dziecko w latach osiemdziesiątych w RPA, Lukas marzy o tym, by zostać mistrzem wyścigów na ćwierć mili. Jego mama mówi mu, żeby trzymał się z dala od tych ludzi, ponieważ są rasistami. Lukas jest zbyt młody, by wiedzieć, co to jest rasista i słyszy to jako "rasista". Film śledzi jego podróż jako młodego człowieka we współczesnej RPA, gdzie ograniczenia wynikające z koloru skóry nie mają już zastosowania... od zera do bohatera w 10 sekund! Z pomocą dwóch szalonych bio-chemików, Lukas będzie ścigał tytuł króla ćwierć mili w Brakpan!

programme.title: Teksańska bawełna
programme.desc: Doświadczony stróż prawa wierzy, że aresztowany nieznajomy jest niewinny. Gdy zaczyna drążyć sprawę, odkrywa tajemnice, które na zawsze zmienią jego miasteczko.

programme.title: 6 Niepalących
programme.desc: Dr Henry Caldwell, najlepszy mediator na świecie, staje przed największym wyzwaniem w swojej karierze, kiedy przyjmuje sześciu współlokatorów, których jedyną wspólną cechą jest to, że żaden z nich nie pali.

programme.title: Atrofia
programme.desc: Paranoja to klasyczny kryminał. Ambitny detektyw Ben (James Ray) prowadzi śledztwo w sprawie morderstwa męża najlepszej przyjaciółki swojej żony (Shane Dean).

programme.title: W Kręgach W Zbożu
programme.desc: W Kręgach W Zbożu. Ukryty świat kręgów w zbożu jest zagrożony, gdy ambitna dziennikarka telewizyjna planuje ujawnić prawdę. Dziennikarka zagłębia się w świat mitologii celtyckiej i UFO, aby odkryć zarówno piękno, jak i niebezpieczeństwo jakie niesie ze sobą prawda, której poszukuje.

programme.title: Omen
programme.desc: Mirę nawiedzają coraz to straszniejsze koszmary. Jej ojciec postanawia wyjechać z córką i swoją ciężarną żoną z dala od miasta na ustronne ranczo w Teksasie. Liczy, że tam rodzina odpocznie.

programme.title: Beach Love
programme.desc: Zmuszony do opieki nad młodszą siostrą po stracie obojga rodziców, szesnastolatek trafia do zagranicznego miasteczka surfingowego z prawie zniedołężniałymi dziadkami, ale szybko znajduje ukojenie w fantazjach o pin-up girl i wyrusza, by ją odnaleźć. Wyruszając w drogę kradzionym samochodem z nieproszonym gościem, jego poszukiwania prowadzą do wielu wyzwań, samopoznania i, co zaskakujące, nowej miłości." Written By Melanie McAvoy.

programme.title: W Tym Wieku
programme.desc: W Tym Wieku. Jest piątkowy wieczór. Piątka przyjaciół u progu dorosłości zbiera się w domu, by świętować koniec kolejnego szkolnego tygodnia.

programme.title: W Pułapce Strachu
programme.desc: Darlene i jej córka Victoria szukają schronienia w odległym wiejskim domu dla maltretowanych kobiet, prowadzonym przez surową i twardą, ale sympatyczną i pomocną Bea. Sprawy przybierają zły obrót, gdy Bea okazuje się być kompletną wariatką, która ma szczególnie niebezpieczny wpływ na podatną na wpływy Victorię.

programme.title: Pocałunek Lady X
programme.desc: Zhańbiony były tajny agent ryzykuje swoje życie, a także życie swojej ragtagowej drużyny, gdy szuka zemsty na charyzmatycznym terroryście, który zabił jego żonę.

programme.title: Check Point
programme.desc: Port City w Północnej Karolinie: Podczas rutynowego biwaku miejscowy włóczęga, który był dawnym żołnierzem piechoty morskiej, natrafia na plany inwazji na Amerykę

programme.title: Piraci z wybrzeża
programme.desc: Wspaniała, barwna włoska epopeja kostiumowa z Barkerem w roli kapitana statku, który musi zmierzyć się z przebiegłymi piratami. Film ma kilka interesujących zwrotów akcji i mnóstwo niespodziewanych wątków.

programme.title: Kod wieczności
programme.desc: Po dokonaniu rewolucyjnego wynalazku o wielkich konsekwencjach, Bridget odkrywa wady firmy, z którą współpracowała nad prototypem fontanny młodości. Kiedy zrywa umowę i odchodzi, szybko zdaje sobie sprawę, że firma nie cofnie się przed niczym, żeby ją odzyskać. Rodzina Bridget zostaje porwana, żeby wymusić korzystne głosowanie. Cała nadzieja zostaje w nastoletniej córce Bridget Mirandzie i jej sojusznikach: Corey’m (weteranie wojskowym z problemami) i Stephanie (prostytutce).

programme.title: Drzwi do Śmierci
programme.desc: Wszystko zaczyna się od anonimowego SMS-a z zaproszeniem na imprezę. Tuzin młodych mężczyzn i kobiet zbiera się, je, pije, imprezuje i spędza czas swojego życia w zniszczonej rezydencji - aż do momentu, gdy nadchodzi czas wyjazdu. Frontowe drzwi się nie otwierają, tylne drzwi również się nie otwierają.

programme.title: Egzekutor
programme.desc: Bezwzględny zabójca, szkolony na żołnierza Boga przez skorumpowanego księdza, przewartościowuje cel swojego życia gdy uratuje życie małemu chłopcu.

programme.title: Specjalność zakładu
programme.desc: Samotny mężczyzna z trzeciego pokolenia właścicieli wielkiej sieci restauracji Tortilla Hut musi znaleźć nowe danie do menu. W wiejskiej restauracji w Nowym Meksyku poznaje uroczą, znakomitą szefową kuchni.
Programista komputerowy staje się coraz bardziej rozczarowany podczas pracy nad projektem mającym na celu replikację ludzkiej inteligencji przy użyciu mapy ludzkiego genomu.

programme.title: Anioły w Piasku
programme.desc: Czy Esperanza będzie w stanie pokazać Tomowi prawdę o jego przeszłości, teraźniejszości i przyszłości? Czy uda jej się uratować wszystkich młodych ludzi na świecie, którzy cierpią na depresję w okresie Bożego Narodzenia? Czy uda jej się przekonać Toma, by w pełni wykorzystał swoje życie, póki ma na to czas?

programme.title: Porucznik Albert
programme.desc: W 1944 roku, w niemieckim obozie jenieckim, alianccy więźniowie tworzą atrapę o imieniu Albert, by oszukać strażników. Po kilku nieudanych ucieczkach, porucznik Ainsworth, artysta w cywilu, wymyśla model głowy fikcyjnego więźnia, który pomaga im zmylić strażników i uciec z obozu.

programme.title: Poznaj Hope
programme.desc: Historie miłosne dziadka pouczają mężczyznę i dziewczynę o realiach miłości.

programme.title: Miłość Jest Wrogiem Wielkiej, Głuchej Pustki
programme.desc: Pogrążony w cieniu dwóch dysfunkcyjnych romantycznych związków Hank wkracza w świat depresji przenikającej się z nowymi możliwościami. Kiedy poznaje niejaką Rose, wpadając na nią wiele razy w miejscach publicznych, zaczyna się między nimi romans w sposób, w jaki większość ludzi przeżywa przygodę na jedną noc. Hank walczy o sens życia, jako bezrobotny miłośnik przesypiania całych dni i nieudolny w utrzymaniu funkcjonalnego związku ze swoją byłą narzeczoną, Jill. Dopiero brutalne przebudzenie podczas intymnego wieczoru z Jill sprawia, że świat Hanka całkowicie się załamuje. Kiedy już wydaje się, że nic mu się nie uda, Hank znajduje nowy powód do życia.

programme.title: Nadzieja
programme.desc: Młody człowiek sięga dna i nie ma dokąd się zwrócić. Traci wszelką nadzieję, pragnienie i motywację. Dzięki wierze i zaufaniu do Boga powoli buduje się na nowo.

programme.title: Wojny o Niepodległość: Powstanie
programme.desc: Po ciemnej stronie Księżyca otwiera się tunel czasoprzestrzenny, którym do naszej części galaktyki przybywa bezwzględny gatunek obcych. Planeta Ziemia jest na ten atak nieprzygotowana.

programme.title: Fale jeziora
programme.desc: Po stracie ojca, dwie zrażone do siebie siostry ponownie spotykają się z matką w urokliwym rodzinnym domu nad jeziorem i odkrywają, że sekret przezwyciężenia tragedii i odbudowania nadziei leży w ich zdolności do głębszego spojrzenia na siebie.

programme.title: Rajska Dolina
programme.desc: Grupa różnych ludzi chowa się w piwnicy uciekając przed śmiertelnymi skutkami ataku nuklearnego.

programme.title: Kaskaderka
programme.desc: Adan & Samuel, bracia bliźniacy, którzy marzą o sukcesie jako kaskaderzy filmowi, po przyjęciu niejasnego zlecenia zostają wplątani w porachunki mafii. Teraz czeka ich walka o życie. I tym razem jest ona prawdziwa.

programme.title: Osadzony
programme.desc: Weteran wojenny Ray trafia do brutalnego więzienia za obronę swojej narzeczonej. Wśród przemocy, układów i manipulacji ze strony naczelnika, walczy o przetrwanie. Jego jedynym celem jest wyjść z więzienia i wrócić do ukochanej.

programme.title: Nazi Dawn
programme.desc: Siostry z braterstwa studenckiego jadą do letniego domku jednej z nich. Ten okazuje się być nawiedzony przez nazistowskiego mordercę.

programme.title: Ekipa Ratunkowa Ameryki
programme.desc: Grupa tajemniczych złoczyńców znanych jako "The Alliance" zastawia pułapkę na Podatnika. Więżą go, torturują i snują plany publicznego ukrzyżowania.

programme.title: Burza: Powrót Thora
programme.desc: Powrót Thora. Grupa religijnych gorliwców znanych jako The Death Risers ma szatański plan zniszczenia świata poprzez sprowadzenie na Ziemię czczonego przez nich nordyckiego boga: Bogini Nieumarłych, znana jako Hel!

programme.title: W Tych Ścianach
programme.desc: Uwięziona we własnym domu. Niewolnica własnego ciała. Nikt nie usłyszy jej wołania o pomoc. Nikt jej nie uwierzy.

programme.title: Wagon Trail
programme.desc: The son of Sheriff Clay Hartley, of the frontier town Elder, has gotten into bad company and hangs out with an outlaw gang in which, Collins, owner of the Golden Rule Saloon, is the secret head. Sheriff Hartley suspects him, but has been unable to gather the needed evidence. Collins instructs his gang, including young Hartley, to hold up the stagecoach on its return trip from Missionary Flats and take the cargo of gold dust it is carrying. Sheriff Hartley is notified of the planned holdup by one of his deputies who has been spying on Collins, and organizes a posse. A deputy-sheriff is killed in the ensuing gunfight between the lawmen and the outlaws, but Deputy Joe Larkin, pursues and...

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRC's Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Gunsmoke Ranch
programme.desc: Flagg is relocating flood victims to Gunsmoke Ranch. The Three Mesquiteers know Flagg to be a crook and try to warn them. They ignore the warning and improve the land only to find that it has been condemned for a new dam.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, sent by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In Mysterious Decoy, Pat and Stony get involved with the famous half-way house that settled the Utah-Arizona boundary. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the boys rout out Ole Gimpy's ghost.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is shot dead after discovering oil on his property. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951 .It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: An ex-con is released from prison seeking vengeance against those who put him there. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective who chases outlaws preying on the railroads of the west. In this episode he has to deal with the legendary Chief Crazy Horse (George Keymas) Also starring Mary Castle, Chubby Johnson, John Holland, and Alma Beltran. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie track down Black Bart, a famous criminal responsible for a string of stage coach robberies. .Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle.Also starring Arthur Space, Sammy Ogg, Marc Hamilton, Frank Sully, and I. StanfordJjolly. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this epsiode, Storts and Hurley are holding hostage a doll that brings good luck to a Mexican village. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a couple of con men attempt to snare Letty into their scheme and spirit her away to San Francisco. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Winter essentials are stolen on their way to a village. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook suspect that Carpenter is being bamboozled by the Mohawk guide helping him establish a new settlement. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The son of a neighboring rancher intends to sell their land for a mining operation that will ruin the water rights agreement that Andy and Ben made years ago. Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: Frontier Justice
programme.desc: Hoot Gibson is back! But he never imagined he'd find his father in an insane asylum and his cattle ranch overrun with sheep! Worst of all, Roger Williams stars as the diabolical James WIlton, a rival who isn't above murder. For trivia buffs: Director Robert F. McGowan was the man behind several of the classic Our Gang comedies...

programme.title: Hands Across The Border
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures western about horse breeders vying for a contract with the U.S. Army. The cast also includes such favorites as Onslow Stevens and Guinn Big Boy Williams, while songs include Hey Hey (It's a Great Day), Dreaming to Music, and The Girl with the High Button Shoes. For movie buffs: The music for the title song, Hands Across the Border, was composed by none other than Hoagy Carmichael!
